title: Ceiling Fans, Air Conditioning, Cable Ready, Play Park
map_address: 1420 W. Main St near Old Orchard
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 800 Sq.
Ideally located off Main Street in Lewisville, Wimbledon Apartments provides a private, gated setting within walking distance of shops, grocery stores, and restaurants.
Our elegantly-landscaped property contains a resort-style swimming pool with sundeck, playground, a fitness center and assigned covered parking.

Walk-In Closets, Microwave, Washer/Dryer - In Unit, Washer/Dryer Hookups, Disposal, Pantry, Dishwasher, Cable Ready, Linen Closet, Two Inch Blinds, Ceiling Fans, Ice Maker, Fireplace, Upgraded Hardware, Vinyl Plank in Wet Areas, Designer Lighting, Dining Room, Air Conditioning, Balcony, Patio, Porch, or Yard, Storage Units, Large Bedrooms
New Online Services, Online Maintenance Requests, Online Payments, Sparkling Swimming Pool, Outdoor Kitchens, Pool Lounge Area, Play Park, Fitness Studio
We welcome up to 2 pets (cats/dogs) per apartment home.
No fees with certain breed restrictions.
Please call our leasing office for more details.
